text: A new #COVID19 #vaccine is on the horizon, thanks to researchers @NNUH on @NorwichResearch Park. The trial  was delivered in the NNUH-run Clinical Research Facility (CRF) @TheQuadram. Consultant Endocrinologist Professor Jeremy Turner explains his work on the #Novavax trial 💉 https://t.co/VHT3mfNeQ0
